title: Constant dc from pvp.net in open menu,champ select.
body: Im not sure why but I constantly DC from pvp.net for maybe 3 seconds. Its getting frustrating during champ select already ran the repair and it went through pretty fast

replies.body: I've also tried uninstalling and re installing.

Tried that didn't help. What i don't get is how It happened out of nowhere no update or anything. And IPHelper being disabled makes it so you cannot connect to secure webpages if i remember correctly... Would be cool if Riot could come in and give an update or some information on the issue.
Tried it and it didn't work for me :(

Go to services.msc and stop a service called IPHelper, should solve the problem.

I got that fix from reddit.  Seems to work for now...
Yep I'm getting this too, every few seconds it happens.  Really annoying because I need to finish the blackwater event!
I'm pretty sure there is a problem going on right now. I have had plenty of issues disconnecting/reconnecting to pvp.net. I am trying to switch servers right now and seeing if it will let me on.
